name: 胡同來
objective:
本課程目的為學生與指導教授一起討論訂定出研討主題，透過指導教授所開的書目及論文，與學生自己尋找的素材，由學生採取獨立、主動的角度去探討該主題，並與指導教授做定期或不定期討論，在此過程中培育出獨立研究能力的效果。

Independent studies are designed to enable advanced students to investigate a specific topic of interest in greater depth than is possible in a traditional classroom environment. Student and faculty advisor must work together to provide direction for the independent study and to insure its success.
